overview: “Do you like money?”  “I'll give you all I have if you kill me.”  Some city night...  Told by an attractive female customer that he'll receive a lot of money if he kills her, Uber driver decides to take her up on the offer...  So they go to the promised place.  As promised, a uber driver tries to kill a woman. Suddenly she changes her mind.  "Do not kill me..."  Uber driver is embarrassed when she suddenly changes her mind.  And ... he feels the urge to kill more and more.
title: Driver
